author: Marston, John, 1575?-1634.
publisher: By V[alentine] S[immes] for William Aspley, and are to be solde at his shop in Paules Church-yard,
notes: The first word of the title is xylographic.
Printer's name from STC. "Quires B-E .. are by another printer".
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
